segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman looks while the sink is overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water pouring over the edge of the sink, creating a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to see her so unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, trying to get cookies without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, which makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is encouraging him, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like shouting to warn them about the water and the unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, unlike the scene unfolding inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR
